pageProps.content:
Experience

Overlooking the mighty Zambezi River, Victoria Falls River Lodge was Zambezi National Park’s very first private game lodge.
Its amazing location – so close to the majestic Victoria Falls – offers guests the unique opportunity to see the spray of the Falls in the distance!
With uninterrupted views & an idyllic riverside setting, Victoria Falls River Lodge never fails to impress. Besides excellent wildlife viewing, luxurious accommodation & fine dining, guests will have quick access to one of the Seven Natural Wonders of the World & all its adventure activities.

Stay

Victoria Falls River Lodge boasts 13 luxury tented suites (of which 5 are family units), 6 island treehouse suites, set apart on a private island as well as 2 star bed treehouses raised on a rooftop deck.
Each of the luxury thatched tented suites is constructed of canvas, glass & timber & extends out onto a private deck with its own splash pool. Here, guests can enjoy uninterrupted views of the Zambezi River & natural bush.
Family tents are similar, but also include an adjoining room with either a single & a bunk bed or twin beds.
The island treehouse suites, as the name suggests, are set on a private island & are ideal for guests looking for a highly exclusive experience (aged 16 years & older) while each of the double-storey star bed treehouses features an open-air rooftop deck with a sitting area & a signature star bed suspended above the treetops.
The main lodge boasts a swimming pool & an open-plan dining & sitting area that offers sensational views of the Zambezi.

Activities

Activities at Victoria Falls River Lodge include in-suite massages, game drives within the 60,000-hectare national park & exciting boat cruises on the Zambezi.
Victoria Falls also offers a variety of activities, including river rafting, bungee jumping, helicopter flights & much more!

subfolders.title: Batonka Lodge
subfolders.description: The owner-run Batonka Lodge is set within easily walking distance to the majestic Victoria Falls in Zimbabwe. This small & elegant retreat offers good value & comfortable inter-leading rooms, which makes this a first choice for families traveling with children.

subfolders.title: Ilala Lodge
subfolders.description: Ilala Lodge is ideally situated on the Zimbabwean side of the mighty Zambezi River, only a short walk from the magnificent Victoria Falls. The perfect base from which to explore one of the World’s Seven Natural Wonders, Ilala Lodge is the closest resort to the majestic Vic Falls.

subfolders.title: Matetsi Victoria Falls
subfolders.description: Matetsi Victoria Falls is set on the banks of the mighty Zambezi River within a private game reserve on the Zimbabwean side of the Falls. Matetsi allows guests to combine an action-packed visit to Victoria Falls with a luxurious safari.

subfolders.title: Rovos Rail
subfolders.description: Rovos Rail offers a luxury train holiday like no other.   Apart from owning & operating the most luxurious trains in the world, Rovos Rail offers guests a variety of train journeys - each ranging from 2 nights to 2 weeks.

subfolders.title: Stanley & Livingstone Boutique Hotel
subfolders.description: The Stanley & Livingstone is a small boutique hotel with only 16 suites set in a 6 000-acre private game reserve about 10km from Victoria Falls on the Zimbabwean side. A safari hotel in Victorian style reflects the old-world charm of that bygone era.

subfolders.title: The Elephant Camp
subfolders.description: The Elephant Camp is located within in a private concession, a short drive from the magnificent Victoria Falls on the Zimbabwean side of the Zambezi River. The camp overlooks a waterhole that is fed by natural streams in the rainy season that rush down to meet the Masuwe River & the Zambezi gorges below the Falls.

subfolders.title: The Victoria Falls Hotel
subfolders.description: The Victoria Falls Hotel, also known as “the grand old lady of the Falls,” is situated in the Victoria Falls National Park, a World Heritage Site on the Zimbabwean side of the Zambezi River. The Edwardian-style 5-star hotel was built in 1904 & is a proud member of the exclusive Leading Hotels of the World group.  For more than 110 years The Victoria Falls Hotel has been a luxury icon in Africa.

subfolders.title: Victoria Falls River Lodge
subfolders.description: Overlooking the mighty Zambezi River, Victoria Falls River Lodge was Zambezi National Park’s very first private game lodge.   Its amazing location – so close to the majestic Victoria Falls – offers guests the unique opportunity to see the spray of the Falls in the distance!

whatWeLoveItems: An ideal location close to Victoria Falls
Exciting boat cruises on the Zambezi River
Open 4x4 game drives in Zambezi National Park
Ideal for couples or families (family tents)
